info.propertiesContent:
##Parameters from baseprojectinfo SCMUser=$SCMUser SCMUrl=$SCMUrl SCMPassword=$SCMPassword SCMBranch=$SCMBranch SCMTYPE=$SCMTYPE SCMcredential=$SCMcredential createTime=$createTime lastModifyTime=$lastModifyTime maxExcutiontime=$maxExcutiontime mailOnSuccess=$mailOnSuccess mailOnfail=$mailOnfail mailOnReovery=$mailOnReovery $exraProperties
##Parameters from Maven project mavenId=$compile_maven jdk=$compile_jdk #cloud=$cloud #imageName=$imageName
#stage parameter Compile_goal=$compile_compileGoal #Compile_goal=$compile_compileGoal #Compile_goal=$compile_compileGoal
Artifact_continueOnfail=$artifact_continueOnfail Artifact_skip=$artifact_skip
CreateImage_skip=$createImage_skip CreateImage_tag=$createImage_tag CreateImage_registry=$createImage_registry
DeployToRancher_skip=$deployToRancher_skip DeployToRancher_service=$deployToRancher_service DeployToRancher_arg=$deployToRancher_arg DeployToRancher_cmd=$deployToRancher_cmd
Findbugs_skip=$findbugs_skip Findbugs_continueOnfail=$findbugs_continueOnfail Findbugs_inFilterUrl=$findbugs_inFilterUrl Findbugs_inFilterContent="$findbugs_skip" Findbugs_excludeFilterUrl=$findbugs_excludeFilterUrl Findbugs_excludeFilterContent="$findbugs_excludeFilterContent"
MavenTest_skip=$mavenTest_skip MavenTest_continueOnfail=$mavenTest_continueOnfail MavenTest_goal=$mavenTest_compileGoal
OSWAPDepend_skip=$OSWAPDepend_skip
PushImage_skip=$pushImage_skip
Sonar_continueOnfail=$sonar_continueOnfail Sonar_skip=$sonar_skip
# SonarUrl=$sonar_url SonarCredential=$SonarCredential
